head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Boating Victim Identified

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Boating Victim Identified

block.p: A man who died on Saturday afternoon after falling from a boat into Jamaica Bay was identified by the police yesterday as Charles Rosenberg, 37, of Hewlett. Mr. Rosenberg fell from a boat about 400 yards from the Canarsie Pier, the police said. Mr. Rosenberg and another man, who was not named by the police, fell into the water about 4 p.m., the police said. The other man was rescued by another boat and was taken to Peninsula Hospital Center, where he was in stable condition on Saturday. Police rescuers pulled Mr. Rosenberg from the water, and he was later pronounced dead at Staten Island University Hospital, the police said.
